title: AI Chat Assistant
description: Welcome to the token-based AI chat. Each message will consume one credit from your account.
content: This chat interface demonstrates token-based metering. You start with 50 credits and each AI interaction consumes 1 credit.

title: Chat Interface
description: Ask me anything! Your remaining credits are displayed above.
welcomeMessage: Welcome to Clarity Compass! I'm here to help you with token-based assistance. How can I help you today?
